# Introduction

Could I use Docker?

This seems like genius:
```sh
 alias nvim="docker run -it -v `pwd`:/mnt/volume --workdir=/mnt/volume anatolelucet/neovim:stable"
alias nvim="docker run -it -v `pwd`:/mnt/volume --workdir=/mnt/volume anatolelucet/neovim:nightly"
```
